entries.s_fd6095f2: No, I haven't finished the job yet.
entries.s_fb6bb29c: Hello, pilot! The Alliance is in need of some talented space fighters. Are you interested?
entries.s_f82b0fd5: Okay. Let's try again. I have a critical medical supply transport headed through the asteroid belt. I need someone to make sure it survives its trip. You interested?
entries.s_f150abd: Thanks for doing that little job for me.  I'll let you know if there's something else we need done.
entries.s_d1d526e: Take your time. The Force be with you.
entries.s_c8f5aa73: Sorry. I really don't have the time for this right now.
entries.s_a7887ccd: Don't waste my time, newbie.  I've got someone else to meet.  Talk to you later.
entries.s_8ff3ca72: Hey escorter! You're a bad-ass escorter!
entries.s_7133d198: You LIE! Liar! I already got word from the transport that you gave up! Get out of my sight!
entries.s_64815da3: The Imperials have squeezed off our major supply route through this system. I have a critical medical supply transport headed through the asteroid belt. I need someone to make sure it survives its trip. You interested?
entries.s_30b5d96: Yes. What do you need done?
entries.s_2cbca1ae: Great! Great work! The Alliance thanks you.
entries.s_20355b4c: Hi there. So - did you escort our Rebel supply ship?
entries.s_197dcc5d: Excellent. Meet the transport in the asteroid belt. The Force be with you!
entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (escortsample.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
